byline: Jonathan Zittrain, Queena Kim and Bruce Johnson
teaser: Tomorrow, the International Consumer Electronics Show kicks off. But today, the swarms of company reps and entrepreneurs arrive in Las Vegas. And there's already buzz on several topics. One of those is the internet of things. But not the idea of a toaster that can communicate with the fridge. We've been talking about that since last year. This year, it’s about exactly how all of our devices will communicate.
